bidwist

Class Card

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JLabel
            • bidwist.Card
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Card>, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.SwingConstants

    public class Card
extends javax.swing.JLabel
implements java.lang.Comparable<Card>, java.awt.event.MouseListener
    Card -- models playing cards It has 2 public enums: one for the suit, one for the rank It has a framework for handling mouse events. It can keep track of the CardGroup it belongs to.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • getAceHiFileName

        public java.lang.String getAceHiFileName(Card.Suit s,
                                         Card.Rank r)
        Get filename for the face image from the Rank when Ace is high. The file names for clubs are: c1.gif == ace c2.gif == 2 ... c10.gif == 10 c11.gif == jack c12.gif == queen c13.gif == king Other suits are the same except the first letter is d or h or s.
        Parameters:
        s - Suit the suit for the card
        r - Rank the rank for the card
        Returns:
        String file name for the card

      • getAceLoFileName

        public java.lang.String getAceLoFileName(Card.Suit s,
                                         Card.Rank r)
        Get filename for the face image from the Rank when Ace is high The file names for clubs are: c1.gif == ace c2.gif == 2 ... c10.gif == 10 c11.gif == jack c12.gif == queen c13.gif == king Other suits are the same except the first letter is d or h or s.
        Parameters:
        s - Suit the suit for the card
        r - Rank the rank for the card
        Returns:
        String file name for the card
